numbered_ace_sentences: 1. This is Wednesday's moderation of "What’s Going On in This Graph?".
2. Today's graphs compare five professional sports leagues.
3. The five professional sports leagues are football and basketball and soccer and baseball.
4. Basketball has a women's league.
5. Basketball has a men's league.
6. The graphs compare the percentage of players who are people of color.
7. The graphs compare the percentage of head coaches who are people of color.
8. Today, from 9 am to 2 pm E.T., you can share responses online.
9. You can respond to three questions.
10. The first question is "What do you notice?".
11. The second question is "What do you wonder?".
12. The third question is "What impact does this topic have on you and your community?".
13. You can share a catchy headline.
14. The catchy headline captures the ideas in these graphs.
15. By Friday morning, we will reveal the article that included these graphs.
16. The article includes these graphs and much more.
17. We look forward to reading your discoveries.
18. You can get a link to your response.
19. You can share the link with your teacher.
20. You can share the link with your classmates.
21. You can click the response box below your response.
22. You can click "Email me when my comment is published".
23. You can visit the archive.
24. The archive shows all graphs in this series.
25. The archive is at tinyurl.com/NYTGraphs.
26. You can view the archives that link to all past releases.
27. The past releases are organized by topic.
28. The topic index is at tinyurl.com/NYTGraphsTopicIndex.
29. The past releases are organized by graph type.
30. The graph type index is at tinyurl.com/NYTGraphsTypeIndex.
31. The past releases are organized by Stat Nugget.
32. The Stat Nugget index is at tinyurl.com/NYTGraphsStatNuggetsIndex.
33. You should keep noticing.
34. You should keep wondering.
35. The next graph is about U.S. air pollution.
36. The next graph will be released by Friday, Feb. 5, 2021.
37. The next graph will have moderation on Wednesday, Feb. 10, 2021.
